name: The Snowblind Waste
description: A frozen nightmare with rotten visibility, frequent storms, and terrifying Behemoths, the Snowblind Waste seems caught in a perpetual battle between umbral and frost aether. Some freelance treasure hunters who discovered a few Unseen relics there have hypothesized the cultists had some influence on the island's lethal equilibrium of frost and umbral, but the official Orrery position is that this kind of power is far beyond a "mere cult". Both Arkan Drew and Dr. Priyani have warned their superiors that this is short-sighted.

island_events.name: Aether Surge
island_events.description: Aether surges are a common occurrence across the Hunting Grounds, attracting powerful Behemoths and other hostile creatures.

island_events.name: Dark Matter
island_events.description: Umbral aether has a way of corrupting everything it touches. Defeat the Behemoths and creatures, but avoid umbral instabilitites.

island_events.name: High Alert
island_events.description: Extremely powerful Behemoths pose an even greater threat to the island's ecosystem. Slay it quickly.

journal_entries.name: Cultist Mask
journal_entries.description: There are two ways to explain this discovery. Either it's a warning to the Unseen to stay away from this island lest they face the consequences, or it's a warning from the Unseen to stay away from this island lest you face the consequences.
